DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate effect dexamethasone inflammatory reaction uterine artery embolization . The secondary purpose study investigate effect dexamethasone postembolization syndrome ( severe pain , nasea vomit ) .
DOC.criteria: Uterine artery embolization due multiple myoma adenomyosis Diabetic mellitus Steroid administration Liver kidney dysfuntion High baseline CRP leukocytosis ( > 11,000/Î¼L ) Drug allergy
